name: U.S. Global Investors, Inc.
description: U.S. Global Investors, Inc. is a publicly traded investment management company based in San Antonio, Texas, specializing in global investment strategies. Founded in 1968, U.S. Global Investors focuses on providing high-quality investment products and services tailored to individual and institutional investors. The company is well-known for its expertise in international markets and its innovative approach to investing in sectors such as natural resources, emerging markets, and global equities. U.S. Global Investors offers a variety of mutual funds and exchange-traded funds (ETFs) that cater to different investment goals, including the U.S. Global Jets ETF, which invests in airline companies, and several funds that focus on gold and precious metals. The firm emphasizes research-driven investment decisions and aims to deliver exceptional returns while managing risk. With a commitment to sustainable investing, U.S. Global Investors also integrates environmental, social, and governance (ESG) factors into its investment processes, helping clients align their portfolios with their values. The company prides itself on its experienced management team and strong client relationships, providing financial education and insights to empower investors in achieving their financial objectives.
